title: Amalfi Awesome!!
text: We loved the Amalfi. The beds were comfy and the Aveda hair products were great. The staff always greated us and welcomed us back. It's in a great location to walk around and see the sites of Chicago. We woke up to a continental breakfast each morning and the newspaper waiting outside our door. Each evening the Rafello lounge had cocktails and a wonderful antipasto repast to enjoy as we met other hotel guests. Thank you Amalfi. You made our first visit to Chicago spectacular.
